edu.udel.cis.vsl.sarl.config.common

Class ConfigFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.udel.cis.vsl.sarl.config.common.ConfigFactory

  • public class ConfigFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory for producing and manipulating SARL configuration files and SARLConfig objects.

    • Method Detail

      • fromFile

        public static SARLConfig fromFile(java.io.File configFile)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Parses a SARL configuration file.
        Parameters:
        configFile - the configuration file
        Returns:
        the SARLConfig object resulting from parsing that file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if anything goes wrong reading the file
        SARLException - if the configuration file does not conform to the proper syntax

      • findSARLConfigFile

        public static java.io.File findSARLConfigFile()
        Looks for a SARL configuration file by first looking in the current working directory for a file named .sarl. If no file by that name is found, it looks in the user's home directory for .sarl. If that is not found, it looks in the current working directory for a file named .sarl_default. If that is not found, it looks in the home directory for .sarl_default.
        Returns:
        the SARL configuration file, or null if not found

      • checkConfig

        public static void checkConfig(SARLConfig config)
                        throws SARLException
        Checks that a SARLConfig object corresponds to the actual system on which we are running.
        Parameters:
        config - a SARLConfig object
        Throws:
        SARLException - if a theorem prover specified in the config is not found, or cannot be executed/loaded, or does not have the version specified

      • findConfig

        public static SARLConfig findConfig()
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Finds and parses the SARL configuration file.
        Returns:
        SARLConfig object resulting from parsing the configuration file, or null if a configuration file was not found
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if anything goes wrong reading the configuration file
        SARLException - if the configuration file does not conform to the proper syntax

      • makeConfigFile

        public static void makeConfigFile()
                           throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Searches for theorem provers on the user's system and creates a SARL configuration file .sarl in the user's home directory.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the configuration file cannot be created in the home directory
